scenes.description: Hakui Koyori performs "Koyori-ni-mu-Chu" (a cover of Yukihana Lamy's "Lamy-ni-mu-Chu").

subtitles.original: Even if I sneeze, I'm happy all day!
subtitles.english: Even if I sneeze, I'm happy all day!

subtitles.original: Last time you leave her alone for a while
subtitles.english: Last time you leave her alone for a while

subtitles.original: Even more you ask me to slap your face
subtitles.english: Even more you ask me to slap your face

subtitles.original: How can it be would be like this disgusting life
subtitles.english: How can it be would be like this disgusting life

subtitles.original: Don't you want step on me? In my bath water?
subtitles.english: Don't you want step on me? In my bath water?

subtitles.original: Are you really falling to the funky sweet babe?
subtitles.english: Are you really falling to the funky sweet babe?

subtitles.original: Open your mouth, in bath water. Step in you and kick you harder. Give me your heart over and over me.
subtitles.english: Open your mouth, in bath water. Step in you and kick you harder. Give me your heart over and over me.

subtitles.original: Am I so mean to you? I'm a baka.
subtitles.english: Am I so mean to you? I'm a fool.

subtitles.original: Don't you hate me, I won't let go of you anyway so.
subtitles.english: Don't you hate me, I won't let go of you anyway so.

subtitles.original: Don't you look at me, that is no actually.
subtitles.english: Don't you look at me, that is no actually.

subtitles.original: Because I think you are sweet, please forgive me.
subtitles.english: Because I think you are sweet, please forgive me.

subtitles.original: I'm just kidding, hit me! Step on my cutest chubby belly
subtitles.english: I'm just kidding, hit me! Step on my cutest chubby belly

subtitles.original: and play with me, I can be to give you more and more a lot of love.
subtitles.english: and play with me, I can be to give you more and more a lot of love.

subtitles.original: Whenever I'm lonely, but your voice makes me happy and smile.
subtitles.english: Whenever I'm lonely, but your voice makes me happy and smile.

subtitles.original: This world for just you and me, I'm here always.
subtitles.english: This world for just you and me, I'm here always.

subtitles.original: Where is your place? Like Wonderland.
subtitles.english: Where is your place? Like Wonderland.

subtitles.original: It would be looks like underground.
subtitles.english: It would be looks like underground.

subtitles.original: They always throw them far away.
subtitles.english: They always throw them far away.

subtitles.original: Come here from before outside.
subtitles.english: Come here from before outside.

subtitles.original: When you are hiding by alone.
subtitles.english: When you are hiding by alone.

subtitles.original: We will be together, time of wonderful.
subtitles.english: We will be together, time of wonderful.

subtitles.original: Stay and who you want to be, come alive.
subtitles.english: Stay and who you want to be, come alive.

subtitles.original: Follow our highway, when I must smile with you
subtitles.english: Follow our highway, when I must smile with you

subtitles.original: and believe hopping popping.
subtitles.english: and believe hopping popping.

subtitles.original: When you cry in my happy story and stay step by step.
subtitles.english: When you cry in my happy story and stay step by step.

subtitles.original: When I'm mad and obsessed, and they will be out of bits.
subtitles.english: When I'm mad and obsessed, and they will be out of bits.

subtitles.original: Starting of the wonderland from my power Wonderland!
subtitles.english: Starting of the wonderland from my power Wonderland!

subtitles.original: まじ最高ー！
subtitles.english: This is the best!

subtitles.original: まだまだいけるよなー！
subtitles.english: You guys can still go, right?!

subtitles.original: もっと！もっと！盛り上がってけー！
subtitles.english: More! More! Let's get hyped!

subtitles.original: Don't you want step on me? In my bath water?
subtitles.english: Don't you want step on me? In my bath water?

subtitles.original: Are you really falling to the funky sweet babe?
subtitles.english: Are you really falling to the funky sweet babe?

subtitles.original: Open your mouth, in bath water. Step in you and kick you harder. Give me your heart over and over me.
subtitles.english: Open your mouth, in bath water. Step in you and kick you harder. Give me your heart over and over me.

subtitles.original: Open your mouth, in bath water. Step in you and kick you harder. Give me your heart, always be with me.
subtitles.english: Open your mouth, in bath water. Step in you and kick you harder. Give me your heart, always be with me.

subtitles.original: こよりにむちゅーからちゅっとしてまえ
subtitles.english: Be in love with Koyori and give me a kiss.

subtitles.original: わーお！
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: ホロライブサンキュー！
subtitles.english: Hololive, thank you!

subtitles.original: 元気ですかー！
subtitles.english: How are you all doing?!

subtitles.original: 一緒に、わーおわーお盛り上がってねー！
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped together, wow wow!

subtitles.original: 絶対無理よ！
subtitles.english: It's absolutely impossible!

subtitles.original: 待って待って、不意打ちだし。だってだって、不安になるし。
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, it's so sudden. Because, because, I get anxious.

subtitles.original: 全然嘘つけないし。だってだって、バカ正直だし。
subtitles.english: I can't tell a lie at all. Because, because, I'm foolishly honest.

subtitles.original: 正真正銘、きっと僕次第だ。
subtitles.english: Truly, it must be up to me.

subtitles.original: ビターギブアップなんて言わないんだから。
subtitles.english: I won't say things like "bitter give up".

subtitles.original: じっとしてらんないし。だってだって、動いちゃうし。
subtitles.english: I can't stay still. Because, because, I just keep moving.

subtitles.original: ワン・ツー・ステップでドンドン進めば、夢の式溶けちゃうの。
subtitles.english: If I keep moving forward with a one-two step, the dream formula will melt away.

subtitles.original: なりたい僕を。君が好きな僕を。ちゃんと余りなく見せたいな。
subtitles.english: The "me" I want to be. The "me" that you like. I want to show it all to you properly.

subtitles.original: あ・ちゃ・ちゃ、びっくりするほどできないじゃん。
subtitles.english: Oh no, I can't do it at all, it's surprising.

subtitles.original: 間違って悩んだりばっかじゃん。
subtitles.english: I'm always making mistakes and worrying.

subtitles.original: 手掛かりを君に見つけて欲しくて、僕は君に向き合いたい、だったならハッピー。
subtitles.english: I want you to find the clues, I want to face you, if so I'd be happy.

subtitles.original: わーおわーお、泣いてないで愛して嫉嫉して。
subtitles.english: Wow wow, don't cry, just love me and be jealous.

subtitles.original: わーおわーお、ダメな僕のこと覚えておいて。
subtitles.english: Wow wow, remember even the bad parts of me.

subtitles.original: こよりにむちゅーからちゅっとしてまえ！
subtitles.english: Be in love with Koyori and give me a kiss!

subtitles.original: 問答しようとか何思っちゃって沈んだり。
subtitles.english: What was I thinking, trying to argue and feeling down.

subtitles.original: 案外いけるかも、ふわり浮かんじゃってバタ足。
subtitles.english: Maybe I can actually do it, floating up and fluttering my legs.

subtitles.original: ぐったりがやめられない。お座りしてそれなんだっけ。
subtitles.english: I can't stop feeling exhausted. What was that thing I did when sitting down?

subtitles.original: ぴったりが止められない。また歩いて壁にあたるの。
subtitles.english: I can't stop being a perfect fit. Walking again and hitting a wall.

subtitles.original: ワン・ツー・ステップ、深呼吸してるの。やめてハイ、勘違いで。
subtitles.english: One-two step, I'm taking a deep breath. Stop it, yes, it's just a misunderstanding.

subtitles.original: 欲しがる君と愛しすぎの僕とで、もっといける気がしています。
subtitles.english: Between the wanting you and the overly-loving me, I feel like we can go even further.

subtitles.original: あ・ちゃ・ちゃ、びっくりするほどできないじゃん。間違って悩んだりばっかじゃん。
subtitles.english: Oh no, I can't do it at all, it's surprising. I'm always making mistakes and worrying.

subtitles.original: 手掛かりを君に見つけて欲しくて、僕は君に向き合いたい、だったならハッピー。
subtitles.english: I want you to find the clues, I want to face you, if so I'd be happy.

subtitles.original: だってやっぱり一人じゃだめだって、集まって合図して歌えば、ほら一等星。
subtitles.english: Because after all, I can't do it alone, but if we gather and sing on cue, look, we're a first-magnitude star.
